data.message: Build V4 Cinematch homepage in code: Successfully implemented the V4 Duro Homepage design as React/Next.js components. Created 8 new components (HeaderV4, HeroV4, ProofBandV4, VibesGridV4, HowItWorksV4, FeaturedCreatorsV4, FinalCtaV4, FooterV4) in src/components/home-v4/. Created data file src/data/home-v4.ts. Updated src/app/page.tsx to use new components. TypeScript check passed, build successful with 28 routes.
